rounds.comments: (Alex: Survey said! That's a tribute to my friend, Dickie Dawson, who always gives me plugs on his show, and I'm returning the favor today.)

clues.text: The 1st U.S. "surveyor" landed here in 1966 & sent back pictures

rounds.text: The Antilles are a group of islands that arc between Florida & this South American country
